name: SARAD
paper: SARAD: Spatial Association-Aware Anomaly Detection and Diagnosis for Multivariate Time Series
description: SARAD trains a Transformer to learn the spatial associations, the pairwise inter-feature relationships which ubiquitously characterize such feedback-controlled systems. As new associations form and old ones dissolve, SARAD applies subseries division to capture their changes over time. Finally, SARAD performs anomaly detection via autoencoding in the association space
